5th International Conference on Control
Dynamic Systems, and Robotics (CDSR'18)

June 7 - 9, 2018 | Toronto, Canada

Announcements

1

CDSR 2018:

CDSR 2018 will be held in Toronto, Canada on June 7 - 9, 2018.

2

Best Paper Award:

Two best paper awards will be conferred to author(s) of the papers that receive the highest rank during the peer-review and by the respected session chairs. Please visit Paper Submission for more information.

3

Become a Sponsor or an Exhibitor

CDSR attracts a wide range of researchers in the field of control, dynamic systems, and robotics. As a prominent company in the field of control, dynamic systems, and robotics, we would like to offer you an exhibit at CDSR. Please visit Sponsors for more information.

The Conference Program will be available closer to the conference dates. We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience.

  • Symposium & Workshop
